segments.text: I see the angled view of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sink on the right, overflowing dramatically.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is facing away, drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Apron tied, dress neat, but puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streaming down, floor getting slick.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacked dishes on the counter, innocent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the boy on that two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Reaching into the cookie jar, full of treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His other hand holds a plate steady.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool is tilting backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up, wanting in on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window open to the calm garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This mischief could end badly though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
